{{Actor| | type = Artifact | name = Medical patch | class = MedPatch | game = Strife | doomednum = 2011 | convid = 125, 121, 124 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:HealthPickup|HealthPickup]]→MedPatch
The smallest health inventory item in Strife. Gives 10 Health. ==== DECORATE definition ==== ACTOR MedPatch : {{Class|HealthPickup}} { {{Property|Health}} 10 +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} +{{Flag|INVENTORY.INVBAR}} {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 20 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_MEDPATCH" // "Med patch" {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_STMP" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_MEDPATCH" // "You picked up the Med patch." {{Property|HealthPickup.AutoUse}} 3 States { Spawn: STMP A -1 Stop } }
